item.title: Practical Papers: Chord, A Scalable Peer-To-Peer Lookup Protocol
item.description: Chord is one of the original Distributed Hash Table projects from the MIT PDOS group at Computer Science and AI Laboratory, MIT. Here is a link to the original research for your reading pleasure. I was introduced to Chord by the book Distributed Systems by Maarten van Steen and Andrew S. Tanenbaum (p. 246, p. 248) as a solution for implementing a decentralized naming system or a structured decentralized overlay network.
